m_szDocSumamry: EV Revolution (& Fleet Workshop Tomorrow in Vancouver) Clean Energy Canada . This coming Monday, Clean Energy Canada and the Fraser Basin Council—in collaboration with Electric Mobility Canada—are presenting  Electrify Your Fleet  in Vancouver, as part of Electric Mobility Canada’s national  EV2014VE conference . This preview by Jeremy Moorhouse and Charlotte Argue outlines why electric vehicles and fleets make for a perfect match.
